help_member.title: Success Points System - Help
help_member.description:
Welcome to the Success Points system! Here's how it works:

**üìä How to Earn Points:**
‚Ä¢ Post images of your successes in designated success channels
‚Ä¢ Each unique success image earns **1 point**
‚Ä¢ Duplicate images are automatically detected (no points)

**üíæ Where Points Are Stored:**
‚Ä¢ All points are stored securely in JSON format
‚Ä¢ Points are tied to your Discord user ID
‚Ä¢ Data is persistent and backed up

**üéØ How to Check Your Points:**
‚Ä¢ Use `/rspoints` command to see your current total
‚Ä¢ Use `/rsleaderboard` to see top 10 members
‚Ä¢ Use `/rsredeeminfo` to learn about redemption options

**üèÜ Leaderboard:**
‚Ä¢ Top 10 members by points are displayed
‚Ä¢ Updated in real-time as points are awarded
‚Ä¢ Compete with other members!

**‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes:**
‚Ä¢ Points reset to 0 if you lose your membership role
‚Ä¢ Only original, unique success images count
‚Ä¢ Points are non-transferable
help_member.footer: Use slash commands for member features

help_admin.title: Admin Commands - Success Points Bot
help_admin.description:
**Admin Commands (use `!` prefix):**

‚Ä¢ `!checkpoints <member>` - Check points for a specific user
‚Ä¢ `!addpoints <member> <amount>` - Add points to a member
‚Ä¢ `!removepoints <member> <amount>` - Remove points from a member
‚Ä¢ `!setpoints <member> <amount>` - Set exact points for a member
‚Ä¢ `!status` - Show bot status and statistics
‚Ä¢ `!reload` - Reload config and messages from files
‚Ä¢ `!configinfo` - Display current configuration

**Required Permission:** `manage_messages`
